deque.hpp

00001 #ifndef  BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DEQUE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DEQUE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // deque.hpp
00011

00018 
00019 #include <deque>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/serialization/collections_save_imp.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/collections_load_imp.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace serialization {
00029 
00030 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00031 inline void save(
00032     Archive & ar,
00033     const std::deque<U, Allocator> &t,
00034     const unsigned int /* file_version */
00035 ){
00036     boost::serialization::stl::save_collection<
00037         Archive, std::deque<U, Allocator> 
00038     >(ar, t);
00039 }
00040 
00041 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00042 inline void load(
00043     Archive & ar,
00044     std::deque<U, Allocator> &t,
00045     const unsigned int /*file_version*/
00046 ){
00047     boost::serialization::stl::load_collection<
00048         Archive,
00049         std::deque<U, Allocator>,
00050         boost::serialization::stl::archive_input_seq<
00051         Archive, std::deque<U, Allocator> 
00052         >,
00053         boost::serialization::stl::no_reserve_imp<std::deque<U, Allocator> >
00054     >(ar, t);
00055 }
00056 
00057 // split non-intrusive serialization function member into separate
00058 // non intrusive save/load member functions
00059 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00060 inline void serialize(
00061     Archive & ar,
00062     std::deque<U, Allocator> &t,
00063     const unsigned int file_version
00064 ){
00065     boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, file_version);
00066 }
00067 
00068 } // namespace serialization
00069 } // namespace boost
00070 
00071 #include <boost/serialization/collection_traits.hpp>
00072 
00073 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS(std::deque)
00074 
00075 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DEQUE_HPP
